== Thaikkad (CT) (627803) ==

Thaikkad (CT) is a town in the [[Chavakkad]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 3.73 sq. km. and harbouring 1539 households with total population of 6594 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 27 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 322 km. Male population is 3055 and female population is 3539. Scheduled Caste population is 153 and Scheduled Tribes population is 13. Census Location Code of the town is 627803<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 27 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 95 km. Railway station is at Guruvayoor at a distance of 5 km.
